title: User Guide
subtitle: Learn how to use OttoCollect effectively

addBanknote.title: How to Add a Banknote to Your Collection

step1.title: Go to the Catalogues
step1.description: From the top menu, click on "Catalogues".

step2.title: Choose a Country
step2.description: Click on the country whose banknotes you want to view.

step3.title: Browse and Add Banknotes
step3.description: Scroll through the list of banknotes. To add one to your collection, click the "+" icon on the top-right of the banknote card.

step4.title: Add More Banknotes
step4.description: Repeat the process for every banknote you own. You can quickly add multiple this way.

step5.title: View Your Collection
step5.description: Once you're done, go to the "My Collection" section from the menu to see all the banknotes you've added.

step6.title: Remove a Mistaken Entry
step6.description: If you added a banknote by mistake: Click on that banknote in your collection. On its page, click the trash icon üóëÔ∏è to remove it. The banknote will be deleted from your collection.

editBanknote.title: How to Add Information or a Picture to a Banknote in Your Collection

step1.title: Open "My Collection"
step1.description: From the top menu, click on "My Collection" to access your personal banknotes.

step2.title: Select a Country
step2.description: Choose the country of the banknote you'd like to edit.

step3.title: Choose the Banknote
step3.description: Scroll down and click on the banknote you want to update.

step4.title: Click the Edit Icon ‚úèÔ∏è
step4.description: In the banknote details page, click on the Edit icon (typically a pencil).

step5.title: Fill in the Details
step5.description: A form will appear. You can now: Add or update quantity, Enter notes, grade, purchase source, or any other personal details.

step6.title: Click "Change Picture"
step6.description: To upload or replace a photo, click the "Change Picture" button.

step7.title: Select Your Image
step7.description: Choose a front or back image of the banknote from your device.

step8.title: Edit Image (Optional)
step8.description: Adjust or crop the picture to fit the required display area.

step9.title: Save
step9.description: Click the Save button to confirm changes.

step10.title: Click "Update"
step10.description: To finish, click the Update button to apply the edits to your collection.

suggestPicture.title: How to Suggest a Picture from Your Collection to the Main Catalogues

step1.title: Go to the Banknote Page
step1.description: Navigate to the banknote page in your collection that contains the photo you want to suggest.

step2.title: Click "Suggest to Catalogues"
step2.description: Above your uploaded banknote image, click the "Suggest to Catalogues" button. This submits your image for review by an administrator.

step3.title: Wait for Review
step3.description: Your suggestion will be reviewed by the site's admin team. They may approve or reject your submission based on quality and clarity.

step4.title: Edit and Re-Suggest if Needed
step4.description: If you edit or change the image later, the system will allow you to suggest it again for catalogues inclusion.

note.title: Best Picture Wins
note.description: Only the best-quality images are selected for the main catalogues. Admins may choose another user's photo if it's better suited.
